name: Lagos Linen Blazer
description: A relaxed-fit linen blazer cut for the Lagos heat. Clean structured shoulders, open front, deep side pockets. Wear it over a tee or dress it up — it holds either look.
care_instructions: Dry clean or hand wash in cold water. Hang to dry. Do not iron on high heat.
fit_notes: Relaxed fit. Model is 6'1 wearing size L. Size up if between sizes.

name: Corduroy Wide-Leg Trouser
description: Wide-leg corduroy trouser with a high waist and clean drape. The kind of trouser that makes an outfit. Pairs with anything — sneakers to loafers.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold. Tumble dry low. Iron on reverse to preserve texture.
fit_notes: High waist. Wide leg. True to size. Model wears size M.

name: Cotton Boxy Tee
description: The foundation piece. Heavyweight cotton with a boxy dropped-shoulder cut. Slightly longer at the back. Wears well alone or layered under a jacket.
care_instructions: Machine wash cold inside out. Air dry. Do not bleach.
fit_notes: Oversized boxy fit. Model is 6'0 wearing size M. Size down for a closer fit.

name: Leather Loafer
description: Chunky-sole penny loafer in full-grain leather. A grounded shoe that works in any setting — board meetings to street markets.
fabric_details: Full-grain leather upper. Leather lining. Rubber lug sole.
care_instructions: Wipe clean with a dry cloth. Condition with leather balm every few months. Avoid prolonged water exposure.
fit_notes: True to size. Wide-fit customers should size up half a size.
